mapper.insert: insert into company(NO, NAME, CODE, stock_type) values(COMPANY_SEQ.nextVal, #{name}, #{code}, #{stockType})
mapper.select: select no, name, code, stock_type as stockType from company order by no

select stock.no, com_no as comNo, open_date as openDate, open_price as open, close_price as close, high_price as high, low_price as low, volume, fluc_state as flucState, raise, rate from stock, (select no from company where name=#{comName}) company where stock.com_no = company.no

select RT_ANALISYS.no, company.name as comName, ana_code as anaCode, news_code as newsCode, yesterday_fluc as yseterdayFluc, today_fluc as todayFluc, today_inc as todayInc, today_dec as todayDec, today_equ as todayEqu, tomorrow_fluc as tomorrowFluc, tomorrow_inc as tomorrowInc, tomorrow_dec as tomorrowDec, tomorrow_equ as tomorrowEqu, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as regDate from RT_ANALISYS, company where RT_ANALISYS.com_no = company.no and company.name = #{name}
select no, news_code as newsCode, today, total from news_count
